in_brief:
Dr. R. Krishnasamy presently holds the position of Assistant Professor (Senior Grade) at Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore since January 2023.  Previously he was an Assistant Professor in the same institution from 2019 to 2022. He did Post-Doctoral Research under the mentorship of Prof. Raju K George at Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology, Thiruvananthapuram sponsored by DST-SERB from June 2017 to May 2019.  He worked as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Mathematics, Knowledge Institute of Technology, Salem from June 2014 to May 2017.  He obtained his both M.Phil. and Ph.D degrees in Mathematics under the guidance of Prof. P. Balasubramaniam from The Gandhigram Rural Institute-Deemed University, Gandhigram in the year 2009 and 2014 respectively.   He post graduated in Mathematics from Bharathiar University in the year 2008 and graduated in Mathematics from Sri Vasavi College, Erode affiliated to Bharathiar University, Coimbatore in the year 2006. 
        He is a member of Indian Society for Technical Education. He has published 15 research papers in various  journals and two book chapters. His research areas include stability and stabilizability of dynamical systems especially neutral systems, singular systems and stochastic systems. He has qualified TNSET 2016 and GATE 2022 exams. He is a recognized research supervisor in Anna University to guide Ph.D candidates (Ref. No.: 2670016).
